oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Thomas Hospital Home for Nurses, Nashville, Tennessee, between 1945 and 1949
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographs and some correspondence, spanning circa 1945-49, related to the construction of St. Thomas Hospital Home for Nurses, a Nashville project of the Foster & Creighton Co. Contractors. The Nurses Home was located at 20th Avenue and Church in Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Foster & Creighton General Contractors Collection. 42 items: b & w photographs and correspondence.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: St. Thomas Hospital Home for Nurses (Nashville, Tenn.)
